questions.question: A popular algorithm for building decision trees.
A measure of impurity used in decision tree splitting criteria.
A decision tree learning algorithm for categorical target variables.
A technique to prevent overfitting in decision trees.
A measure of the average reduction in impurity during tree construction.
A decision tree learning algorithm for continuous target variables.
A node in a decision tree that has no child nodes.
A decision tree learning algorithm that handles both categorical and numerical features.
